description: The CookBot project is an AI-powered recipe app that lets users input ingredients and discover creative recipes tailored to what they have. With intuitive filters like meal type, diet, and cuisine preferences, CookBot delivers personalized recipe suggestions and direct links to detailed cooking instructions.
An all-in-one travel app that helps users plan trips by finding attractions, malls, pharmacies, restaurants, airports, and more. Users can also save multiple trips for future reference.
An interactive map application where users can mark and share sightings of cryptids and other mythical creatures.
An OpenAI-powered tool that generates custom interview questions based on the job role and skills required.
A creative AI application that generates catchy and unique product names for entrepreneurs and businesses.
An AI-based application that helps users improve their writing by suggesting corrections for grammar and spelling mistakes.
A language translation tool powered by ChatGPT, enabling users to translate text between multiple languages seamlessly.
A payroll management system designed to help businesses track employee salaries, bonuses, and deductions efficiently.
A task management application that allows users to create, track, and organize their tasks and projects visually.
A weather forecasting tool that provides users with real-time weather updates and forecasts for their selected locations.
